title: Senior DIG Deshabandu Tennakoon assaulted
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Senior DIG in charge of the Western Province Deshabandu Tennakoon was assaulted by a group on Tuesday (10) afternoon.
A senior police officer stated that the senior DIG was injured in the attack, and further stated that the group that attacked the DIG, also caused damage to the DIG’s vehicle.
